content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion title_tag=”h5″ shape=”square” c_icon=”chevron” c_position=”right” active_section=”” no_fill=”true” collapsible_all=”true” title=”Here are some of the most frequent questions that we get asked about our wrapping services:”][vc_tta_section title=”01. How much time does it take to transform my kitchen / bathroom ?” tab_id=”1691660535007-64badb27-139c”][vc_column_text]Generally it takes 1 working day to finish your kitchen or bathroom, however it may take up to 2 working days, depending on the scope of work and size of your property.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section i_position=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”icon-down-big” add_icon=”true” title=”02. I am not the owner of the property, can I still wrap my kitchen / bathroom ?” tab_id=”1691660721927-4832f7f3-0525″][vc_column_text]One of the advantages of wrapping is that it is reversible, and in case you want to remove it, or you are vacating your rented property, it can be easily done. However, most of the landlords prefer to keep it even after previous tenants vacate, because it increases the rental value of the property.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”03. Is there any warranty that I will get for your wrapping services?” tab_id=”1691660763978-fe5da996-5de0″][vc_column_text]We give up to 5 years warranty for our wrapping services, and up to 15 years for our flooring services, depending on the selected products.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”04. How durable is the wrapping material that you use ?” tab_id=”1691664190064-8027d396-39f0″][vc_column_text]Our interior films are durable and scratch resistant, as long as it is not intentionally being scratched. They are also waterproof, antifungal, and fire retardant, and you can place hot objects up to 110° degrees celsius directly on the surface.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”05. Can you install your product on damaged surface?” tab_id=”1691664194833-2e1dc73a-ba6e”][vc_column_text]There are several methods how we can fix those damages, and we will do our best to rectify them before proceeding with wrapping.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”06. How much does it cost to wrap a kitchen / bathroom?” tab_id=”1691667802564-dcd08288-8e98″][vc_column_text]There is no same kitchen or bathroom, and we would require images of your space to provide you with cost estimate. After that, our specialist will visit your space to do the measurements, and same time you can select finishings and patterns that you like. Based on the size and materials, we will then provide you with final quotation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”07. What are the payment terms ?” tab_id=”1691669304647-4cc19dfa-a2dd”][vc_column_text]We require 50% downpayment to book the slot, and  50% on the day of installation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”07. What are the payment terms ?” tab_id=”1691669579552-72889a97-946d”][vc_column_text]We require 50% downpayment to book the slot, and  50% on the day of installation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”08. Do I have to prepare my space before wrapping?” tab_id=”1691669625787-bc2564e9-b42f”][vc_column_text]We would only ask you to remove all appliances and any other loose objects / obstacles that would be in the way for wrapping.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][vc_separator][vc_column_text]

Have any other questions about our services ?

Let us know below, we will be happy to answer.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    [/vc_column][/vc_row]
